Unnamed Aunt | relationships = [[Monica Geller]] (kissed) }} '''Timothy Burke, M.D.''' is the son of [[Dr. Richard Burke]] and his ex-wife [[Barbara Burke]]. He is also the brother of [[Michelle Burke]] and the uncle of Michelle's son Henry. He appeared in the [[season 4]] episode "[[The One With Chandler In A Box]]", portrayed by [[Michael Vartan]]. Timothy Burke substituted as [[Monica Geller|Monica's]] eye doctor while his father was out of town. Monica invited Timothy to have [[Thanksgiving]] with the group. She was attracted to him, while her friends all thought it was weird. When they kissed however, Timothy reminded Monica of Richard. (In a deleted scene, Timothy said Monica reminded him of a younger version of his mom.) Both of them were very disturbed by this, and ultimately decided against attempting a relationship.
